name: Coconut Flan
keywords: dessert, side dish, milk, shredded sweetened coconut

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bring kettle of water to a boil. Arrange six 3/4-cup custard cups in a baking pan, 13 by 9 by 2 inches. In large bowl, combine condensed milk, whole milk, eggs, egg yolks, and vanilla. Mix well. Add coconut and stir to blend. Divide mixture among cups.

Pour boiling water into baking pan to come halfway up sides of the cups. Bake until just set in center, about 30 minutes. Remove flans from pan and allow to cool. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, 2 to 24 hours.
